org.owasp.jsptester.report
Class ReportGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.owasp.jsptester.report.ReportGenerator

public class ReportGenerator
extends Object

Class that encapsulates generating files related to the report web app, including the individual test cases, the final summary and any other base files necessary to deploy the web application

Author:
Jason Li

Method Detail

generateLibraryReport

public List generateLibraryReport(TagLibraryInfo tagLibrary,
                                  TagProperties tagProperties,
                                  Attack[] attacks,
                                  File outputDir)
                           throws IOException
Generates a report on the given tag library using the given attacks and places the output in the given outputDir.

Parameters:
tagLibrary - the tag library to test
tagProperties - the tag properties to use
attacks - the set of attacks to use
outputDir - the output directory to place the report in
Returns:
a List<File> of files generated
Throws:
IOException - if any I/O error occurs

generateTagReport

public List generateTagReport(TagLibraryInfo tagLibrary,
                              TagProperties tagProperties,
                              TagInfo tag,
                              Attack[] attacks,
                              File outputDir)
                       throws IOException
Generates a report on the given tag from the given tag library using the given attacks and places the output in the given outputDir.

Parameters:
tagLibrary - the tag library being used
tagProperties - the tag properties to use
tag - the tag to be tested
attacks - the set of attacks to use the output directory to place the report in
outputDir - the output directory to place the report in
Returns:
a List<File> of files generated
Throws:
IOException - if any I/O error occurs

                                         throws VelocityException
Returns the singleton instance of the report generator

the singleton instance of the report generator
Throws:
VelocityException - if the Velocity engine cannot be initialized
